attributes.action: Create a national fitness and wellbeing programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the government invest in the future of Britain by ensuring that everyone has free access to their local leisure centre, for swimming, gym and other sports facilities.

with regards to Obesity prevention is better than cure. It would provide cost savings across the board whilst promoting healthy living and participation in team sports, leading to improvements over our current social problems.
